meanings.definition: A substance that is added to another substance to improve its effectiveness or stability.
meanings.sent1: The scientist added a coerectant to the solution to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: The coerectant enhanced the performance of the cleaning solution.
meanings.sent3: The coerectant and the main substance became best friends, making everything better.
meanings.sent4: The coerectant acted like a superhero, boosting the power of the solution.
meanings.sent5: Adding the coerectant was like giving the solution a magical upgrade.

meanings.definition: To add a substance to another substance to improve its effectiveness or stability.
meanings.sent1: She will coerectant the mixture to ensure it works perfectly.
meanings.sent2: Coerectanting the ingredients will make the product more reliable.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to coerectant the recipe with a secret ingredient.
meanings.sent4: He coerectanted the potion, turning it into a powerful elixir.
meanings.sent5: Coerectanting the solution was the key to its success.
